articles.title: JWST spots planetary building blocks in a surprising galaxy - Nature.com
articles.description: Planets might be more common throughout the Universe than previously thought, suggest results from the James Webb Space Telescope.
articles.content: Scientists found the ingredients for planet formation in a star cluster called NGC 346, which lies in the Small Magellanic Cloud. Credit: NASA, ESA, CSA, O. Jones (UK ATC), G. De Marchi (ESTEC), and … [+4068 chars]
